productivity.description: Calculate productivity state, performance, and/or trajectory indicators.

NDVI trends.description: Calculate trend of annually integrated NDVI.

Pixel RESTREND.description: Calculate pixel residual trend (RESTREND_ of annually integrated NDVI, after removing trend associated with a climate indicator.

Water Use Efficiency (WUE).description: Calculate water use efficiency (evapotranspiration divided by NDVI).

Rain Use Efficiency (RUE).description: Calculate rain use efficiency (precipitation divided by NDVI).

sdg-sub-indicators.description: Calculate all three SDG sub-indicators in one step.

download-data.description: Download data from Google Earth Engine assets.

total-carbon.description: Calculate total carbon in biomass (above and below ground).
